Name: ID Generator
Desc: Generates a random hexadecimal identifier with customizable length and prefix.
LongDesc: The ID generator creates unique, random hexadecimal strings that can be used as identifiers throughout an application. It allows customization of both the length of the generated string and an optional prefix. This utility is particularly useful for generating temporary unique IDs for DOM elements, tracking objects in client-side storage, creating keys for component instances, or any scenario requiring non-sequential unique identifiers. The implementation utilizes JavaScript's built-in Math.random function to ensure sufficient entropy for most general-purpose applications while maintaining simplicity and efficiency. The prefix parameter enables organization of IDs by category or function, making debugging and data management more intuitive.
